}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The '''Intel''' logo, "SfP 2230 4C TF5", and "PB#H70224-001" :is silkscreened on the card in the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2625890 FCC photos].
* '''Intel Dual Band Wireless-AC 8260 (8260NGW)''' (2015) Snowfield Peak :''Intel Dual Band Wireless-AC 8260'' (Key A,E) NGFF (M.2 2230) :Device: [http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/8086/24f3 8086:24f3], [http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/8086/24f4 8086:24f4] (3.15), 8086:24f3 [http://www.driverlookup.com/hardware-id/pci/ven_8086&dev_24f3], 8086:24f4 [http://www.driverlookup.com/hardware-id/pci/ven_8086&dev_24f4] :802.11аbgn/ac, 2x2, 2.4/5 GHz (Dual Band), 867 Mbps, Bluetooth 4.2 ::8260NGW - 802.11ac, 2x2, Bluetooth 4.2, PCIe, USB, M.2 2230 ==See also== * [[Intel Dual Band Wireless-N 8260 (8260NGW AN)]] (2015) Snowfield Peak :''Intel Dual Band Wireless-N 8260'' (Key A,E) NGFF (M.2 2230) :Device: 8086:b208, Lenovo Yoga 2 Pro [https://forums.lenovo.com/t5/Lenovo-Edge-Yoga-Flex-Laptops/Re-Yoga-2-Pro-Wifi-Problems/td-p/1452437/page/138 Yoga], [http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/8086/24f3 8086:24f3] ::IWL_PCI_DEVICE(0x24F3, 0x0004, iwl8260_2n_cfg) [http://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/iwlwifi/iwlwifi-fixes.git/tree/drivers/net/wireless/intel/iwlwifi/pcie/drv.c git] ::IWL_PCI_DEVICE(0x24F3, 0x0044, iwl8260_2n_cfg) * [[Intel Dual Band Wireless-AC 8260 (8260D2W)]] (2015) Snowfield Peak :''Intel Dual Band Wireless-AC 8260'' SD Module (M.2 1216) :802.11аbgn/ac, 2x2, 2.4/5 GHz (Dual Band), 867 Mbps, Bluetooth 4.2 ::8260D2W - 802.11ac, 2x2, Bluetooth 4.2, PCIe, USB, M.2 1216 SD ::[https://fccid.io/PD98260D2 FCC ID: PD98260D2] (05/26/2015)
